about.me: Single Pool Operator and Blockchain SysOps Developer
about.server: We maintain a mixture of Cloud and Bare Metal systems on the Cardano MainNet and TestNet Blockchains
about.company: Systems Solutions Developer with professional experience maintaining 24/7 critical Linux Nodes. The Pool was named in memory of our GrandMother. Her spirit continues on the Blockchain checking slots and minting blocks. 0% fees for the rest of 2020.
